channel.title: Where did aarisair go?
channel.description: ok.... im just wondering 1st, why did the server aarisair.com stop? it was the most stable least glitchiest server to be even associated with mopar! it was #1! anyone know why it went offline and if it might ever come back on? or maybe know any servers just like it? cus it was simply the BEST! :( i dont know any other good servers.... im lost!!!!

item.title: Where did aarisair go?
item.dc:creator: @lil_wizzy lil wizzy
item.description:
@lil_wizzy wrote:

yes aarisair is dead, it died months ago all of a sudden.

okay… so aarisair is history? and it sounds like fun… did you mean theres going to be many diffrent servers? or… well… im pretty much asking you to talk in englesh plz…

item.title: Where did aarisair go?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Tainted Mod Tainted
item.description:
@Mod_Tainted wrote:

lol yup it ended sorry but the new upcoming BEST server will be ZanziTaint Pk…so far we just have a no i.p. thing and we are doing great!with 4 no-ip i.p.'s FULL (50 ppl each)but soon we shall be making our own .com site for all u fun loving RPG playerss…so be prepared and have fun!
